title: 1999 BMW M3 Coupe
highlights: This 1999 BMW M3 features the highly regarded S52 engine with a 5-speed manual transmission.
Carfax report shows a clean history with no accidents or mileage discrepancies, registered in California since new.
Factory features include sport seats, M-tuned suspension, and a Harmon/Kardon sound system, as detailed below.
The seller reports recent service and maintenance, including an oil change, brake pad replacement, and suspension inspection.
Launched as part of the E36 generation, this M3 offers a blend of sport and luxury with precise handling and a high-revving inline-six engine.
equipment: Leather sport seats with manual adjustment
18-inch forged alloy wheels with Michelin Pilot Sport tires
AM/FM/CD audio system with six speakers
recentServiceHistory: September 2024: Oil change and filter replacement, brake pads replaced, suspension inspection
June 2023: Upgraded Bilstein shocks and Eibach springs installed
March 2023: New Michelin Pilot Sport tires installed
November 2022: New air intake and Remus exhaust system installed
ownershipHistory: The seller purchased this M3 in August 2020 and has added approximately 5,000 miles since. It has been kept in a garage and maintained meticulously, as shown in the service records.
sellerNotes: This M3 is offered with a complete set of service records and a clean California title.
The car has been maintained to preserve its original handling and performance capabilities.
